widget.name: LinkedIn Embed
widget.description: Mendix Pluggable Widget to embed linkedin content based on https://github.com/justinmahar/react-social-media-embed

property.caption: URL
property.description: The URL of the social media embed.

property.caption: Width
property.description: The width of the embedded content in pixels. Leave empty for default width.

property.caption: Height
property.description: The height of the embedded content in pixels. Leave empty for default.
